column5: My little guy is already begging to go in the boat....  But usually a spin on the seat in the driveway does the job....  But today he took the controls...      http://i1231.photobucket.com/albums/ee516/roosnutz/8B9A3BA1-33A1-42E8-8337-7DDB84007AA3-4462-0000059F1095CE4B.mp4
He's now at a fun age.!!!!!
That's great Mike, but he'll be happier when you buy that full windshield boat
Nice!!!!!!!!  I bet he handles the boat better than you when he gets bigger!!!
I dunno lew... He's getting good with the tiller already...lol
wont be long you will just be the netman. lol.
That's Awesome nothing better then sharing the boat with your kids and wife
